snippet: The Chinese capital beat the Kazakh city in an International Olympic Committee vote and will be the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Games.
abstract: Beijing wins bid for 2022 Winter Olympics, beating only other contender,  Almaty, Kazakhstan, by slim margin; will become only city in history of modern Olympics to have hosted both Summer and Winter Games; Beijing officials plan to construct high-speed railroad linking city to distant mountains where vast artificial snow-making operation will enable skiing events to be held.

byline.contributor: Javier C. Hernández contributed reporting from Hong Kong, and Ruslan Medelbek from Almaty, Kazakhstan. Yufan Huang contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: The Chinese capital beat the Kazakh city in an International Olympic Committee vote and will be the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Games.

headline.main: Beijing Defeats Almaty in Bid to Host 2022 Winter Olympics
headline.print_headline: Goliath Edges David, as Beijing Lands 2022 Winter Games
